Properties

IsAlive

When false, this component has completed all processing and is ready to be removed from its parent.

public override bool IsAlive { get; }

Property Value

bool

Length

The length in milliseconds of this ISample.

public double Length { get; protected set; }

Property Value

double

Name

A name identifying this sample internally.

public string Name { get; }

Property Value

string

PlaybackConcurrency

The number of times this sample (as identified by name) can be played back concurrently.

public Bindable<int> PlaybackConcurrency { get; }

Property Value

Bindable<int>

Remarks

This affects all ISample instances identified by the same sample name.

Methods

CreateChannel()

Creates a unique playback of this Sample.

protected abstract SampleChannel CreateChannel()

Returns

SampleChannel

The SampleChannel for the playback.

GetChannel()

Retrieves a unique playback channel for this ISample.

public SampleChannel GetChannel()

Returns

SampleChannel

The unique SampleChannel for the playback.

Remarks

Multiple channels can be retrieved and played simultaneously, but can only be heard up to PlaybackConcurrency times.

Play()

Creates a new unique playback channel for this ISample and immediately plays it.

public SampleChannel Play()

Returns

SampleChannel

The unique SampleChannel for the playback.

Remarks

Multiple channels can be played simultaneously, but can only be heard up to PlaybackConcurrency times.
